body: I reverted last commit moving HelpDisplayStrings.resx from SMA to new module - I don't know how resolve this problem.

This pull request has been automatically marked as stale because it has been marked as requiring author feedback but has not had any activity for **30 days**. It will be closed if no further activity occurs **within 10 days of this comment**.

@adityapatwardhan I was blocked because there are a breaking changes, depth engine dependencies and  new public API is needed. I asked @SteveL-MSFT and he suggested to pull the draft so that you could  help move forward or reject. I guess it is impossible to rebase the code but we could discuss how we could decouple the module if you and team have time and interest.

This pull request has been automatically marked as stale because it has been marked as requiring author feedback but has not had any activity for **30 days**. It will be closed if no further activity occurs **within 10 days of this comment**.
